data.title: The Celebrity Cookbook - Edited by Dinah Shore - 1966 Edition
data.meta_description: Celebrities have a lesser known side to their lives, usually reserved for intimate friends and family... (from the Introduction) {HISTORY} Did you ever want to cook alongside Lucille Ball or drink a glass of bourbon with Dean Martin? How about breakfast with Jackie Kennedy or a barbecue with Frank Sinatra? Here's your
